definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
to abstain from voting/to forfeit/to waive one's right to vote/to abdicate

sentences.english: Hages Andover's option to buying this property is gonna expire by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 銀行對於這處房產的購置權月底就要失效了。

sentences.english: The family home has been foreclosed.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子喪失了抵押贖回權。

sentences.english: The takings clause mediates between the police power and the eminent domain power.
sentences.chinese: 徵收條款是在警察權有償取得財產權的調和。

sentences.english: Trinity General Insurance Company Limited reserves the final right of approval.
sentences.chinese: 三聯保險有限公司保留保單的最後批覈權。

sentences.english: The reward shall not exceed the value of the ship and other property salved .
sentences.chinese: 本條規定不影響船舶所有人對其他被救助方的追償權。

sentences.english: The establishment of visitation right system is a big step forward in marriage and family legislation in our country.
sentences.chinese: 探望權制度的確立，是我國婚姻家庭立法上一大進步。

sentences.english: In the second chapter I analyzed the realistic basis and the jurisprudence basis on generation and development of environmental right .
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析環境權產生和發展的現實基礎和法理基礎。

sentences.english: Material help right provides foundation and safeguard for the realization of other human rights.
sentences.chinese: 物質幫助權爲其它重要人權的實現提供了基礎和保障。

sentences.english: Applicable to application for Stock Exchange Trading Right only.
sentences.chinese: 只適用於聯交所交易權申請。

sentences.english: He renounces his claim to the money.
sentences.chinese: 他放棄了對那筆錢的要求權。

sentences.english: The second part is about the analysis of the right foundation of the Bankruptcy Recall Right.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是有關破產取回權行使的相關問題的分析。

sentences.english: Generation rights trade is an important part of the power market system.
sentences.chinese: 發電權轉讓交易是電力市場體系中的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The emergency ward can now call directly for the competent specialist.
sentences.chinese: 現在急診科有了呼救權，可直接點名呼請有關專家。

sentences.english: This thesis is meanly to focus on the shareholder's information right of a company limited by shares.
sentences.chinese: 本論文旨在探討股份有限公司下的股東資訊權保障。

sentences.english: And the claim of paternity right is applicable for the action of performance.
sentences.chinese: 身份權請求權在訴訟上表現爲給付之訴。

sentences.english: Chapter Three, Necessity analyse of buliding interpretation right in China.
sentences.chinese: 第三章我國設立釋明權制度的必要性分析。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
